Cyber Claw:





Cyber Claw growled at Dinobot. She took a step back, staring him in the 
optics, then looked away, turning her dull crimson eyes at the ground. She 
snorted before she said, "I am Cyber Claw, a slagging freak!" She sighed. "I 
impersonated you because that is the way I get around. I impersonate my male 
double because that's how I advoid the Maximals. Megatron put me up to it 
once, and--" She rolled her head, looking as if she was slightly embarassed. 
"sometimes I just can't help it. Dinob--or your DNA is stronger than you 
think. It slips sometimes. Mainly when I loose my temper. I came here with 
another bot, I had to use the CR chamber due to my damage, and since I was 
in Maximal grounds, I had no choice but to do my act. And once I was here 
and no doubt that the Maximals knew about the Predacon, I took advantage of 
the situation."

She looked back to Dinobot's face, and raised the side of a long strip of 
black that went across above her eyes. "Now that I answered your question, 
now answer mine."
